alert.note: Alert for Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 3:27PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Millard County through 400 PM MDT... At 327 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 22 miles northeast of Garrison, or 25 miles east of Baker, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kings Canyon. This includes US Route 6 between mile markers 14 and 31. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
